import sys

def maxi(l):
    maximum = 0
    n = len(l)
    for i in range(0, n):
        if maximum <= l[i]:
            maximum = l[i]
    return maximum

def count(cookies,weights,n):
    cnt = 0
    for i in range(0,n):
        m1 = maxi(cookies)
        m2 = maxi(weights)
        if m1 <= m2:
            cnt += 1
            cookies.remove(m1)
            weights.remove(m2)
        else:
            cookies.remove(m1)
    print(cnt)
    

t = int(input())
while t:
    n = int(input())
    cookies = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().strip().split(" ")]
    weights = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().strip().split(" ")]
    count(cookies, weights,n)
    t -= 1
